This document provides a high-level overview of the operation of the agent-based model under development for the Moving the Middle project. The model code is available for download at [this repository](https://github.com/DOSull/moving-the-middle-abm).

Although the model aims to be 'simple' that is a relative term, and there are a lot of moving parts to this model. I have organised the description into a set of linked documents as a way to manage this complexity. The documents are listed below.
